title: PMS Integration
description: Create PMS accounts for your hotels and manage them.
selectHotelPrompt: Select a hotel to view PMS status
provisionDescription: PMS account has not been created for this hotel yet. Click the button below to open PMS.
provisionSuccessDesc: You can log in to the PMS system with the credentials below.
saveCredentialsWarning: Save these credentials in a secure place. The password will not be shown again.
provisionModalDesc: This action will create a PMS account for the hotel and provide you with login credentials.
selectDataToSync: Data to send on initial setup (optional)
roomTypesDesc: Send hotel room types to PMS
boardTypesDesc: Send board types (AI, FB, HB etc.) to PMS
provisionWarning: After PMS is opened, you can log in with these credentials. Save the password securely.

errors.pmsNotEnabled: PMS integration is not enabled for this partner. Please contact the administrator.
errors.alreadyProvisioned: PMS is already opened for this hotel.
